experience.title: Revenue Executive
experience.description: - Supported the commitment of the Organization towards the stakeholders in a reasonable, technical, administrative and commercial manner. - take valid inputs, documentation, statements and credentials available with the Organization as requisitioned from time to time, which shall ensure optimal asset performance by the consultant under its duties and responsibilities hereunder.- took the responsibility to assist in operational and strategic decisions required to optimize the commercial performance to the best of your abilities and the information at hand. The Client has the right to question, not implement or ask for additional details for the inputs, suggestions and strategies suggested by you.- committed on allocating reasonable time, resources and focus required to each asset under discussion with undivided attention and with highest possible transparency.- provided with the relevant training and guidance required to execute the relevant tasks.

experience.title: Revenue Management Executive
experience.description: -Building and maintaining relationships with the Reconciliation team of International Student Accommodation Property Managers, Internal KAM/ Business Development Team, and Data Entry Team. -Meeting the monthly collections numbers/ targets. -Dispute Mangement between internal and external stakeholders related to booking, invoicing, and payment collections issues. -Setting up the reconciliations/ invoicing process with the Student Accommodation Property Managers. -Effective/ professional communication through calls/emails with the International Student Accommodation Property Managers in the USA, UK, and Australia.
